templates.t:
A new version of the
'Estonia - Accounting'
module is available, offering improved KMD and KMD INF reports. Note: Tax grids are updated.
To adjust existing moves, manually update taxes grids or use the
'Account - Allow updating tax grids'
module.

Please install the
'Estonia - Rounding'
module to have access to the rounding features for the Estonian tax report.
